name: HummingWave Technologies
description:
HummingWave is an IT application development company founded in 2013 and specialized in mobile front-ends & cloud back-ends. We have architected, built and run complete IT solutions. 
Our offices are located in India and US. We have built IT systems for large customers like Nestlé, Akamai, and for startups in U.S., India, and Europe. We have a strong team in iOS, Android, Web and Amazon Cloud Development. We have developed several applications in e-commerce, FinTech, HR-Tech, etc. and deployed across a wide variety of devices and platforms.
